attributes.title: terrible!!! total scam!
attributes.review: i love trump, and china, and they both love me. but right after downloading this app it encrypted my phone with a virus firewall bug!! not good or cool donald, i am speechless :( now i need a new phone AND social security number!!! I'M MAD

attributes.title: Disappointment
attributes.review: I had high hopes when downloaded the app. It keeps crashing ...so annoying!! Someone needs to make this app great just like our boy.

attributes.title: 17+ for a reason...
attributes.review: The app supports and shows many inappropriate things and people....when I first opened it I cried for 30 minutes because a giant Cheeto was staring at me! Very unsettling 0/10

attributes.title: Propaganda App
attributes.review: I went on this app only to find it was mostly propaganda. Do not recommend. There are much better information sources out there than this misleading app.
